release_note: Thank you for always using the app. This version update is as follows. Fixed an issue where an error occurred when loading from an iOS file. Added the ability to read files from the iOS Files app as requested by many users. Only M4A format files are accepted Fixed a bug in the restore function of purchase function. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience. If you have any requests please feel free to send them via email from the app s settings menu. We would like to respond as much as possible. Thank you.

Thank you for always using the app. This version is updated as follows. As requested by many users added the ability to read files from the iOS Files app. Only M4A format files accepted Fixed a bug with purchase function recovery functionality. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience caused to you. If you have any requests please feel free to send them via email from the settings menu of the app. We want to be as responsive as possible. Thanks.

Thank you for always using the app. This version update is as follows. Past version update contents are also displayed Added 3 beats to the metronome. Requests accepted Fixed an issue where the app became unresponsive during MIX. We apologize for the inconvenience. Fixed the track status to be retained even if the app is closed. Completely eliminated sound distortion. Modified so that it can be easily mixed with effects. Payment is required to mix with effects Modified so that it can be easily shared with effects and saved in the photo app. Payment is required to share with effects Other bug fixes If you have any requests please feel free to send them via email from the app s settings menu. We would like to respond as much as possible. Thank you.

Fixed an issue where images were not output when saved to the Photos app. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience. You can now select your input device. Requests accepted By selecting Change input device from the recording track menu You can select the input device currently connected to your iPhone. If you have any requests please feel free to send them via email from the app s settings menu. We would like to respond as much as possible. Thank you.

You can now select your input device. Requests accepted By selecting Change input device from the recording track menu You can select the input device currently connected to your iPhone. We have temporarily fixed an issue that was causing an error on iOS13. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience. As this is a temporary fix the following symptoms may occur. The waveform display may not be displayed during recording. When outputting a local file to a photo app there may be no images. We will continue to investigate and release a fixed version as soon as we know the cause. Thank you.

iOS9 series is no longer supported. We have temporarily fixed an issue that was causing an error on iOS13. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience. As this is a temporary fix the following symptoms may occur. The waveform display may not be displayed during recording. When outputting a local file to a photo app there may be no images. We will continue to investigate and release a fixed version as soon as we know the cause. Thank you.

Thank you for using it all the time. I apologize for not updating the version in a while. The following bugs have been fixed. Fixed an issue where it may not be possible to upload to Twitter after exporting to the photo app. Only data newly recorded after this version is valid. Older data may not be uploaded because the format is different. Fixed a bug where the screen would become strange if you deleted anything after this or before this. Fixed an issue where the screen would become strange after loading from iTunesLibrary. If you have any other requests please send us an email. Thank you for your continued support of the app.
Fixed a bug that recording will become double speed. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience.
Fixed the problem that the image becomes strange when supporting to the photo application.
Fixed an issue not output to the photo app. Fix other minor defects

Thank you for always using it! The contents of this update are as follows. Fixed the following problem pointed out in reviews mails etc. When many tracks were added the playing position shifted and the display collapsed was corrected. Fixed a problem where there is a track that does not mix when mixing. I increased the maximum volume value. Pithograph function was added. You can display the pitch of voices etc. as a graph. Β version function After recording the function automatically saved is an option. Data applied with effects volume left right balance reverb will be saved. After setting the effect select the menu button of the track and select apply effect . This makes it possible to mix effects with data and mix them. We are sorry but this function will be charged function. Playing effects is possible so I like it please buy it. If you have any requests feel free to email us as much as we can. Also since it will be the driving force for improvement we appreciate that it can be a reviewer of only stars. Since the evaluation has disappeared when updating I will help if I do it again! Sincerely!
